argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mendplusgfval.a | |- A = ( MEndo ` M ) |
| 2 |  | mendplusgfval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | mendplusgfval.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) |
| 4 |  | mendplusg.q | |- .+b = ( +g ` A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( x oF .+ y ) = ( X oF .+ Y ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mendplusgfval | |- ( +g ` A ) = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x oF .+ y ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_eqtri | |- .+b = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x oF .+ y ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( X oF .+ Y ) e. _V |
| 9 | 5, 7, 8 | #P_ovmpt2a | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .+b Y ) = ( X oF .+ Y ) ) |
